p: The cycle threshold values (Ct-value) of rRT-PCR determine the copy number of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in a specimen. A Ct-value of less than 37 is defined as a positive test, and a Ct-value of 40 or more is defined as a negative test. A medium viral load is defined when Ct-value of 37 to less than 40, and may require confirmation by repeating the test [ 30].
